title: The Admired Yamato Nadeshiko
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>This goes here, and here…. Like this? Dia-chan, did I wear it right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, you’re really skilled at it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ehehe, that’s because my teacher is a good one<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My, then in return, you’re also a splendid student, Emma-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I thought putting on a Kimono was hard, but if I can put on a Yukata then I’m happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>When you’re used to the Yukata, putting on a Kimono wouldn’t be as hard<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m gonna practice putting it on properly, so when summer comes, let’s go to the festival<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s a good idea. Let’s invite everyone then. We need to show them Emma-san’s figure in a Yukata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yaay! I’m going to do my best practicing it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
